E00.label: Question
E00.description: User genuinely seeks information or help, with no implied request for change. Examples: 'When does the library open?', 'How do I borrow a book?'

E01.label: Comment or complaint
E01.description: User shares feedback, praise, or complaints without asking for action or change. Examples: 'The reading room is too cold', 'The staff was very helpful'

E02.label: Suggestion
E02.description: User proposes improvements, expresses wishes for change, or requests that something be done differentlyâ€”even when phrased as a question. Look for implicit 'I wish', 'you should', or 'why don't you'. Examples: 'Could you extend the opening hours?', 'Why not stay open on Sundays?', 'You should get more group study rooms'

E03.label: Invective or harmful content
E03.description: Insults, threats, or hostile/abusive language toward anyone.
